Title: We Lost our $3.5 Million Business
Description:
Today we’ll hear about:

  • Business owners need to start over after their partner stole their clients
  • A business partner wants to continue getting paid, but hasn’t worked in 4 years
  • A business owner struggling to fire his top team member for not following policy
  • A business owner that has no idea what to do with an extra $500k in savings
